name: styleguide-boilerplate
description: A boilerplate KSS node styleguide implementation for projects.

scripts.generate-styleguide: sass scss/styleguide/_styleguide.scss styleguide/caxy-template/public/main-dev.css && ./node_modules/.bin/kss-node scss --template styleguide/caxy-template --css public/main-dev.css --custom devnotes --custom hidemarkup --custom patterntype --custom containspatterns
scripts.generate-styleguide-verbose: sass scss/styleguide/_styleguide.scss styleguide/caxy-template/public/main-dev.css && ./node_modules/.bin/kss-node scss --template styleguide/caxy-template --css public/main-dev.css --verbose --custom devnotes --custom hidemarkup --custom patterntype --custom containspatterns

author: Beck Kramer
